text:
I’m getting an error even just trying to run “hs help”.  I’ve done the update on both the CLI and node.  Any ideas?  (macos 14.2.1, node 12.22.1). Here’s the error I’m getting with any “hs” command:

/usr/local/lib/node_modules/@HubSpot/cli/node_modules/@HubSpot/local-dev-lib/models/HubSpotAuthError.js:11
        this.status = cause.response?.status;
                                     ^

SyntaxError: Unexpected token ‘.’

It's likely because of the optional chaining (the question mark in the code snippet) wasn't available in node 12. You'll need to update node. The latest is `21.7.3` so you're a number of major versions behind.
Well what the deuce, I swear I updated node.  Clearly not.
